about.details:
Incorporated in 2019, Maitreya Medicare Limited is a multispeciality hospital situated in Surat, Gujrat. The main focus of the hospital is multi-disciplinary integrated healthcare services, with primary secondary & tertiary care. Maitreya Medicare offers a comprehensive range of healthcare services across over 18 specialties and super specialties, including Cardiology, Urology, Laparoscopic Surgery, Oncology, Neurosurgery, Spine Surgery, Neurology, Nephrology including Dialysis, Gastroenterology, Gastrointestinal surgery, Cardiothoracic Surgery, Oncosurgery, Orthopedic Surgery including joint replacements and Arthroscopic surgeries, Gynecology & High-Risk Obstetrics, Hepatocellular Billary Surgery, Critical Care Medicine, etc.

As of 2023, the hospital has a 125-bed capacity under the leadership of Dr. Narendra Singh Tanwar, founder, Promoter, CFO, and Managing Director of the hospital, Dr Pranav Rohitbhai Thaker, Promoter & whole-time director, and Mr. Vimal Patel, Promoter & Whole Time Director.

faqs.question: What is the Maitreya Medicare Limited IPO?
faqs.answer:
Maitreya Medicare Limited IPO is a SME IPO of 1816000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹14.89 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹82 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on October 27, 2023, and closes on November 1, 2023.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Maitreya Medicare Limited IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Maitreya Medicare Limited IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Maitreya Medicare Limited IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Maitreya Medicare Limited IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Maitreya Medicare Limited IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Maitreya Medicare Limited IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Maitreya Medicare Limited IPO opens on October 27, 2023 and closes on November 1, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Maitreya Medicare Limited IPO?
faqs.answer: Maitreya Medicare Limited IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,31,200.

faqs.question: How to apply for Maitreya Medicare Limited IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Maitreya Medicare Limited IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Maitreya Medicare Limited IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Maitreya Medicare Limited IPO will be done on Monday, November 6, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, November 7, 2023. Check the Maitreya Medicare Limited IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Maitreya Medicare Limited IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Maitreya Medicare Limited IPO listing date is on Tuesday, November 7, 2023.
